definition: Ba state during Zhou dynasty (in east of modern Sichuan)/abbr. for east Sichuan or Chongqing/surname Ba/abbr. for Palestine or Palestinian/abbr. for Pakistan

to long for/to wish/to cling to/to stick to/sth that sticks/close to/next to/spread open/informal abbr. for bus 巴士[ba1 shi4]/bar (unit of pressure)/nominalizing suffix on certain nouns, such as 尾巴[wei3 ba5], tail
to pull/to play (a bowed instrument)/to drag/to draw/to chat
abbr. for 克羅地亞|克罗地亚[Ke4 luo2 di4 ya4], Croatia/(Tw) abbr. for 克羅埃西亞|克罗埃西亚[Ke4 luo2 ai1 xi1 ya4], Croatia
Hosni Mubarak (1928-), former Egyptian President and military commander

sentences.english: Barack Obama says his 86-year-old grandmother has died.
sentences.chinese: 巴拉克奧巴馬錶示他86歲的祖母去世了。

sentences.english: Mubarak tolerates no challenges to his martial-law rule.
sentences.chinese: 穆巴拉克不容任何對他軍事統治的挑戰。

sentences.english: And a clutch of counter-terrorism laws that were widely abused under Mr Mubarak will be revoked.
sentences.chinese: 一些在穆巴拉克執政期間廣泛濫用的反恐法也將廢除。

sentences.english: Mubarak poster hangs above the souq in Aswan.
sentences.chinese: 穆巴拉克的畫像懸掛在當地的集市上。

sentences.english: Then military helicopters will be sent to Cairo, Mubarak Police Academy for trial.
sentences.chinese: 隨後軍用直升機將把穆巴拉克送至開羅警官學院受審。

sentences.english: Barak says this is an opportunity not to be missed.
sentences.chinese: 巴拉克說，這是一個不能錯失的機會。

sentences.english: Barrak has not answered that question.
sentences.chinese: 巴拉克並沒有回答這個問題。

sentences.english: "Get down, get down, " the anti-Mubarak crowd chanted at him.
sentences.chinese: “趴下，趴下，”反穆巴拉克人羣中高呼他。

sentences.english: Anti-government protesters have reacted angrily to Mr Mubarak's address.
sentences.chinese: 反政府示威者憤怒地作出了反應穆巴拉克先生的地址。

sentences.english: "Libya is too confusing, and it's too dangerous," says Barrack.
sentences.chinese: “利比亞太亂了，同時也很危險，”巴拉克說。

sentences.english: Mr Mubarak's sons Gamal and Alaa have been summoned for questioning as well.
sentences.chinese: 穆巴拉克的兒子蓋莫爾和阿拉也受到了傳喚。

sentences.english: The regime is using the media focus on the Hosni Mubarak trial to finish off Hama," one resident told Reuters by satellite phone from the city.
sentences.chinese: 當局正利用媒體對審判穆巴拉克的關注摧毀哈馬市。

sentences.english: Balaclava is a remote district of Sevastopol.
sentences.chinese: 巴拉克拉瓦是塞瓦斯托波爾的一個偏遠的地區。

sentences.english: An Egyptian court has ordered the dissolution of the political party of the former President Hosni Mubarak.
sentences.chinese: 埃及一個法庭已經下令解散前總統穆巴拉克的政黨。

sentences.english: Plant Michael Ballack eigentlich, das Team in Köln mal zu besuchen?
sentences.chinese: 巴拉克有沒有打算跟隨隊伍去在科隆的比賽？

sentences.english: Luckily for the military, its moment as Mubarak's domestic enforcer may soon be ending.
sentences.chinese: 穆巴拉克政權的即將終結對於軍隊是一個好消息。

definition: Hosni Mubarak (1928-), former Egyptian President and military commander
West Germany/German Federal Republic 德意志聯邦共和國|德意志联邦共和国[De2 yi4 zhi4 Lian2 bang1 Gong4 he2 guo2]
